frontEndText.heading: Apply
frontEndText.paragraph: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the front-end developers, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

frontEndText.heading: Pass the admission
frontEndText.paragraph: Entry test is performed by those candidates who submit their summary. Test results define a priority list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into academy.

frontEndText.heading: Learn from the experts
frontEndText.paragraph: Students will discover all types, techniques and design approaches. They will learn how to write semantic elements in HTML, apply advanced CSS techniques, understand accessibility standards and many more.

frontEndText.heading: Join the company
frontEndText.paragraph: The Academy starts in the end of October and lasts until January. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Front-End Software Engineer.

developersText.heading: Apply
developersText.paragraph: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional three- month course for the developer beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or group assignments.

developersText.heading: Pass the admission
developersText.paragraph: Registration is available for candidates who are willing to pass the entry exam. Results define a list of candidates who are invited into the workshop. We accept 20 candidates with highest marks into the academy.

developersText.heading: Learn from the experts
developersText.paragraph: Students will learn the latest technologies and how to create software using the best tools on the market. Devbridge assigns a mentor to each student to serve as a resource for their development projects.

developersText.heading: Join the company
developersText.paragraph: At the end of term all students will receive recognition for completing the course and top students may receive job offers from Devbridge.

testersText.heading: Apply
testersText.paragraph: Academy students are given an opportunity to be immersed in a professional two-month course for the testing beginners, build their competence through trainings and individual or groups assignments.

testersText.heading: Pass the admission
testersText.paragraph: Best candidates will be offered a paid internship for the Academy period to work on the real projects with our development teams. In parallel they are expected to attend academy to develop their skills.

testersText.heading: Learn from the experts
testersText.paragraph: Students will discover all types of techniques: learn the foundations of testing, functional testing for web applications and API, foundations of non-functional testing and foundations for test automation.

testersText.heading: Join the company
testersText.paragraph: At the end of term all students will receive a certificate of completion the Sourcery academy for Testers. Top graduates will be invited for an interview to become a Junior Test Engineer.
